member.param: The item's SCMM GUID or Steam Name

member.name: P:SCMM.Web.Server.Domain.Models.Steam.SteamCurrency.PrefixText
member.summary: Text to appear at start of price when formatted

member.name: P:SCMM.Web.Server.Domain.Models.Steam.SteamCurrency.SuffixText
member.summary: Text to appear at end of price when formatted

member.summary: Number of decimal places when formatted

member.name: P:SCMM.Web.Server.Domain.Models.Steam.SteamCurrency.ExchangeRateMultiplier

member.name: P:SCMM.Web.Server.Domain.Models.Steam.SteamCurrency.IsDefault

member.name: P:SCMM.Web.Server.Domain.Models.Steam.SteamCurrency.IsCommon
